issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly macOS wheel builds fail
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7651](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7651). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/640350008 for example

```Java

$ install_wheel arrow
~/build/ursa-labs/crossbow/arrow ~/build/ursa-labs/crossbow
ERROR: You must give at least one requirement to install (see "pip help install")
```

cc `[~kszucs]` `[~apitrou]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7651?focusedCommentId=17023289) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6278
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6278>
